title: 2007 Moop Map-looking good!
author: Tom Price
content: Compared to the 2006 map, well, there’s no comparison. Congratulations on a job well done, everyone–really a remarkable clean up job! Not the best image, to be sure, but it’ll do for now till we get a cleaned up digital version ready to share. And as always congrats to DA and Playa Restoration for their fine work!
